data.partBlankContent: The protons have a positive charge. The num___ of pro____ decides wh__ element a_ atom i_. For exa____, i_ an at__ has o__ proton, that me___ it i_ a hydr____ atom; only hydr____ can ha__ one pro___. On the periodic table, the atomic number of the element is the same as its number of protons.
data.fullContent: The protons have a positive charge. The number of protons decides what element an atom is. For example, if an atom has one proton, that means it is a hydrogen atom; only hydrogen can have one proton. On the periodic table, the atomic number of the element is the same as its number of protons.
data.answer: 质子带一个正电荷。质子数决定了原子是什么元素。例如，如果一个原子有一个质子，这意味着它是一个氢原子;只有氢有一个质子。在元素周期表上，这种元素的原子序数和它的质子数是一样的。
